name: Puhas
title: Farm Fresh
bio: With a mission of delivering the freshest vegetables and fruits to the retail grocery stores and consumers directly, Puhas is a B2B2C enterprise with a unique approach toward building bottom-up and efficient supply chains in the FFV (Fresh Fruits and Vegetables) sector.
description: Puhas emerged in the underserved eastern and central India as an endeavour to solve the problems that exist in agriculture that are heavily dependent on the gambles of monsoon and money lenders. Technology being the common denominator of development, Puhas deploys a suite of technology products to enhance the supply chain of FFV. With a purpose-driven product design, Puhas has operationalized a high-frequency technology for production and payments.
